Please follow these instructions to enable Javascript. for sale resale $475,000 5 Lennys Way, West Springfield MA 01089 Gracious custom built five bedroom colonial plus addt'l 1900+/-sq ft fin bsmnt. Open floor plan features kitchen with granite counters, cherry cabinets, center island, pantry, stainless steel appliances,eat-in area-opens to magnificent family room. Formal dining room w/ tray ceiling. Fst floor bdrm or office with full bath and laundry room. Elegant master bedroom and mster bath w/ jacuzzi, dble vanity, walk in closet, dressing area and built-ins. Fin basmnt w/ game room and full bath.
